message:
SYSTEM: 01-ModelosRazonam_-_Intro_%26_DynaLearn_Nov2012.pdf: Página 7
What is Spatial/Temporal Reasoning?
• Spatio-temporal configurations can be described 
quantitatively by specifying the coordinates of the 
relevant objects:
• At time point 10.0 object A is at position (11.0, 1.0, 23.7)
• Or qualitatively, with a finite vocabulary
• Object A hit object B. Afterwards, object C arrived.
• Sometimes we want to reason with such descriptions
• Object C was not close to object A when it hit object B.
-> Qualitative spacial/temporal reasoning
speaker: SYSTEM
